sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RAMPANT in heraldry, a term applied to a lion, leopard, or other beaſt that ffu,nds on its hind legs, and rears up his fore-feet in the poſture of climbing, ſhowing only half his face, as one eye, &c. It is diffe-rent from ſaliant, in which the beaſt ſeems ſpringing forward as if making a ſally.
